resources.string: This app needs a wordlist with valid words to solve the puzzles.\nPlease follow the instructions to download one.

The app is designed to work with a wordlist from dict.cc.\nThe license of these wordlists prohibits the inclusion in the app.\nClick the button below to open your browser and complete the download of the wordlist. Choose a list which starts with your desired language (e.g. you speak english so you can choose EN -> DE).
If you have already downloaded a wordlist you can add it to the app with the button below.\nThis could take a while.
Please grant this permission for the app to work.
Something went wrong reading this file!
Please wait till wordlist is loaded…
All lines need to have the same length (rectangular shape)!
Puzzle is unsolvable! Words to find don\'t match given characters!
Starting to solve puzzle… Please wait.
